creator: Turktell Bilişim Servisleri A.Ş.
descriptionHtml:
YaaniMail allows you to communicate securely anywhere. You can easily read and reply to your mails from your phone, computer or tablet. You can now download to your phone YaaniMail, which is a free service or start using it on the web page.

In Yaani Mail, spam messages are filtered by a security layer. You can also easily mark messages that are important or block senders and let their messages to be put directly into the spam folder.

You can reply mail without Internet
With Yaani Mail you are now free to read or reply to your emails. Without the Internet you can easily review and reply the mail you have received. Once the Internet connection is established, all transactions will be automatically synchronized.

You can easily block Spam E-Mails
With Yaani Mail, your data will be secure by high security data centers in Turkey. With a customized security layer, you are protected against spam and viruses. You can use your e-mails safely and easily.

Turkcell Subscribers do not spend data on internet packages while using Yaani Mail

Turkcell subscribers are more privileged at YaaniMail. Turkcell subscribers cannot spend on internet packages when they connect to YaaniMail application over Turkcell LTE / 3G. In this way, Turkcell subscribers can reach YaaniMail free and easily from anywhere.

Yaani Mail Advantages;

● Easily access your emails from anywhere
● Easily use from phone, tablet or computer
● Easy to use with simple design
● Protects you against spam and viruses
● Continue to read and reply to your emails even without the Internet
● Turkcell Subscribers do not spend data on internet packages
descriptionShort: YaaniMail is a fast and secure e-mail service.

descriptionHtml:
You can read and answer your mails quickly and safely on your devices such as phones, tablets and computers with YaaniMail. Thanks to its user-friendly interface, you can easily follow your e-mails. Now you can open a new mail for free and start using your new email address via YaaniMail.

The advantages offered by YaaniMail can be summarized as follows:

● You can easily access to your e-mails from anywhere.
● You can use it on different devices such as phone, tablet and computer.
● Thanks to its simple design, you can quickly get used to YaaniMail.
● While using your e-mail address, you can protect your device against spam and viruses through YaaniMail.
● You can continue reading and answering your e-mails even if you do not have an internet connection.
● If you are a Turkcell subscriber, you don’t have to use your internet package while using YaaniMail.

Owing To The User-Friendly Interface, You Can Get Used To Your New E-mail Address Quickly

You can easily set up your e-mail on YaaniMail. Thanks to the simple design of YaaniMail, you can get used to the application quickly.

You Can Get Things Done On Your E-mail Without An Internet Connection

One of the biggest advantages YaaniMail offers to its users is being able to login to e-mail without internet connection. By virtue of this feature, you can continue to read and answer any e-mails in cases where there is no access to the internet connection. The transactions you do during internet disconnection are automatically processed the first time you connect to the internet. In this way, you can prevent time losses that may arise due to the internet connection problem.

You Can Use Your E-mail Account Safely

As soon as you create a new e-mail account on YaaniMail, spam mails are separated out through the security filter. All datas are stored in high-security data centers in Turkey. Customized security layer protects you against spam and viruses. You are given the option to block people you do not wish to receive any e-mails. In this way, you can use your free e-mail address on YaaniMail very safely.

You Can Easily Find Your Mails Through Filtering

You can easily find the emails you’re looking for on YaaniMail through filtering. For this, you can mark your mails as "flagged", "unread" or "attached". You can list your important e-mails with the “flagged” option; unread e-mails with the ‘’unread’’ option and e-mails with the attachment with ‘’attached’’ option.

You Can Group Your Emails Under New Folders

On YaaniMail, you can create new folders representing a certain subject and name them. In this way, you can list the e-mails under these new folders.

If You are a Turkcell, You Can Use YaaniMail Without Spending Your İnternet Package.

Turkcell subscribers do not spend their internet packages while using YaaniMail. Turkcell subscribers can use YaaniMail without spending internet packages over Turkcell LTE/3G.

All Users Can Open Free Email

YaaniMail is a free application for all users. In order to see all the features of YaaniMail, you can quickly set up your e-mail adress and start using it on YaaniMail.

Yaanimail Proudly Made In Turkey

YaaniMail was developed by Turkcell’s engineers. You can easily sign up an e-mail account on YaaniMail and start using it safely.

For more information and help, you can visit our website: https://yaanimail.com/

title: YaaniMail

container.value: Soğanlık Yeni Mh. Pamukkale Sokak No:11, 34843 İstanbul

creator: Turktell Bilişim Servisleri A.Ş.
descriptionHtml:
You can create a new e-mail account on YaaniMail and start reading, responding to your e-mails by logging in to your e-mail account quickly and easily on devices such as phone, tablet or computer. Moreover, thanks to the new calendar feature, you can find what you expect from a calendar application. Through the user-friendly interface of YaaniMail, which is a free e-mail provider, you can easily get used to your new e-mail account. In order to open a new e-mail address, you can download YaaniMail application or visit the web page.

● You can open an e-mail account quickly and easily.
● After you create new e-mail account, you can easily keep track of your e-mails.
● You can log in to your e-mail account from different devices such as phones, tablets or computers.
● You can create meetings with the newly added calendar feature.
● User-friendly interface helps you to get used to your new email account easily.
● From the first moment you sign up an e-mail address on YaaniMail, you can safely use your new e-mail address against spams and viruses.
● You can continue reading or sending emails when you lack of internet connection.
● If you are a Turkcell subscriber, you don’t have to use your internet package while using YaaniMail.

You Can Create A Free Mail Account



YaaniMail is a free e-mail provider offered to all users. You can open a free email address with YaaniMail. Thanks to the simple design of YaaniMail, where you can find many features that you can expect from an email provider, you can create an email address quickly and easily.

You Can Sign In to Different Email Providers With Your YaaniMail Account



You can use your YaaniMail email account with other email providers that support IMAP or Pop3. For this, it will be sufficient to activate the Pop3 or IMAP settings of your e-mail account.

You Can Send and Read Emails Without Internet Connection



You can keep on sending e-mails and reading your e-mail inbox when you do not have an access to the internet. When you reconnect to the internet, the transactions you had done during the disconnection are processed automatically. You can save your time with this feature, which is extremely advantageous for both individual email users and corporate email users.

You Can Use The New Calendar Feature



With the newly added calendar feature, you can have what you expect from a calendar application. You can create a meeting or set a reminder on your calendar and manage your events at any time.

You Can Use Your E-mail Address Safely



From the moment you create a new e-mail account, you can start sending and receiving emails safely. As a matter of fact, spam mails are passed through the security filter on YaaniMail. Your data is stored in secure data centers in Turkey. The security layer protects you against viruses and spams. You can block people you do not want to receive any e-mails from.

You Can Filter Your E-mails According To Their Status



After creating a new e-mail, you can filter the e-mails you receive as "flagged", "unread" and "attached" and quickly find the mails you are looking for.

You Can Group Your Emails According To Their Importance and Topic



You can create a new folder for the mails in your inbox and categorize your mails under this folder. Thus, you can group your emails in the folders you named.

You Can Open More Than One YaaniMail Account



You can open up to 20 different e-mail accounts in YaaniMail using the same phone number.

Yaanimail Proudly Made In Turkey



Yaanimail was developed by Turkcell engineers. Your datas are stored in high-security data centers in Turkey. In Yaani Mail, your privacy rights are protected in accordance with data protection laws.

YaaniMail, our mail! DOWNLOAD FOR FREE!
Website: https://yaanimail.com/
Privacy policy: https://yaanimail.com/policy
descriptionShort: YaaniMail is a fast and secure e-mail service.

creator: Turktell Bilişim Servisleri A.Ş.
descriptionHtml:
You can create a new e-mail account on YaaniMail and start reading, responding to your e-mails by logging in to your e-mail account quickly and easily on devices such as phone, tablet or computer. Moreover, you can also use the newly added calendar and dark mode features. Through the user-friendly interface of YaaniMail, which is a free e-mail provider, you can easily get used to your new e-mail account. In order to open a new e-mail address, you can download YaaniMail application.

● You can open an e-mail account quickly and easily.
● You can set dark mode.
● After you create new e-mail account, you can easily keep track of your e-mails.
● You can log in to your e-mail account from different devices such as phones, tablets or computers.
● You can create meetings with the newly added calendar feature.
● User-friendly interface helps you to get used to your new email account easily.
● From the first moment you sign up an e-mail address on YaaniMail, you can safely use your new e-mail address against spams and viruses.
● You can continue reading or sending emails when you lack of internet connection.
● If you are a Turkcell subscriber, you don’t have to use your internet package while using YaaniMail.

Open a Free Mail Account



You can open a free e-mail address on YaaniMail. Thanks to the simple design of YaaniMail, where you can find many features you can expect from an email service provider, you can make your e-mail setup process quickly and easily.

Use Dark Mode



Dark mode feature is available on YaaniMail now. You can set your background dark when using your e-mail address with the dark mode feature, which is also known as dark theme and night mode. In this way, your eyes would be less tired and you’d save more battery.

Follow Your Daily Online Meetings with The Calendar Feature



You can send meeting invitations, follow your online meetings on the new calendar feature. You can manage your online meetings by clicking on the calendar button.

Use Your E-mail Address Securely



After creating a new e-mail account, all spam mails are passed through the security filter on YaaniMail. The datas are stored in secure data centers in Turkey. The security layer protects you against viruses and spam. You can block people you don't want to receive e-mail from. In this way, you can use your e-mail address securely.

Sign In to Different Email Applications with Your YaaniMail Account



You can use YaaniMail email account on the application using IMAP or Pop3. For this, it will be enough to make your e-mail account Pop3 or IMAP mandatory.

Continue Reading Emails Without Internet Connection



You can send e-mails and read your e-mail inbox when you don’t have an access the Internet. When you reconnect to the internet, the transactions you had done during the disconnection are processed automatically.

Filter Your Mails On Your E-Mail Account



After creating a new e-mail, you can filter the e-mails you receive as "Flagged", "Unread" and "Attached" and you can quickly find the e-mails you are looking for.

Categorize Your Emails Under New Folders



You can create a new folder for the mails in your inbox and group your mails under new folders.

Open Multiple Email Accounts



You can open up to 20 different e-mail accounts using the same phone number on YaaniMail..

Yaanimail Proudly Made In Turkey



Yaanimail was developed by Turkcell engineers. Your datas are stored in high-security data centers in Turkey. In Yaani Mail, your privacy rights are protected in accordance with data protection laws.

If you want to open a new e-mail account, you can download YaaniMail right away and open your new e-mail address quickly and easily.

YaaniMail, our mail! DOWNLOAD FOR FREE!
Website: https://yaanimail.com/
Privacy policy: https://yaanimail.com/policy
descriptionShort: YaaniMail is a fast and secure e-mail service.

title: YaaniMail

container.value: Soğanlık Yeni Mh. Pamukkale Sokak No:11, 34843 İstanbul

creator: Turktell Bilişim Servisleri A.Ş.
descriptionHtml:
Türkiye's mail, YaaniMail, now continues to serve through the "Mailim" application.

Mailim offers a fast and secure e-mail service. You can now create an e-mail with @yaani.com from the Mailim; and than start sending and receiving emails on your new e-mail account.

You can open a new e-mail account, start sending and receiving e-mails with Türkiye's mail Mailim fast and securely. You can easily follow and answer all your mails on different devices such as phones, computers and tablets. Moreover, you can also use the newly added calendar and dark mode features. You can quickly download Mailim, which is completely free, to your device or start using it on mobile devices or web.

The main advantages Mailim offers to its users can be listed as follows:

● You can easily follow your e-mails from various devices such as phones, tablets and computers.
● You can set dark mode.
● Thanks to its simple design, you can quickly get used to using Mailim and start sending e-mails easily.
● You can protect your device against spams and viruses on Mailim.
● You can continue to read and reply to your e-mails even if you do not have an internet connection.
● You can use the calendar feature.
● If you are a Turkcell subscriber, you will not spend your internet package while using Mailim e-mail address.

Open A Mail Account Quickly and Easily



You can make a free email address on Mailim. Thanks to the simple design of Mailim, where you can find many features that you can expect from an email service provider, you can make your email sign up process quickly and easily.

It is possible to access the Corporate E-mail Suite Mail via Mailim

Our corporate product, formerly YaaniMail Business, has been renewed as Suit Mail. It is possible to access your Suit Mail corporate e-mail from the Mailim application.

Use Dark Mode



Dark mode feature is available on Mailim now. You can set your background dark when using your e-mail address with the dark mode feature, which is also known as dark theme and night mode. In this way, your eyes would be less tired and you’d save more battery.

Use Calendar Feature On Mailim



You can use the recently added calendar feature on your e-mail address. On the "Calendar" button, you can see the events you have and list the invitations you’ve received. By specifying the day and time, you can submit a meeting request and add notes for the participants of your meeting invitation.

Send and Read E-mails Without Internet Connection



You can keep on sending and reading e-mails when you do not have an access to the internet. When you reconnect to the internet, the transactions you had done during the disconnection are processed automatically. You can save your time with this feature, which is extremely advantageous for both individual and corporate email users.

Find The Emails You Are Looking For By Filtering



You can quickly access the e-mails you are looking for on Mailim. You can filter your mails as "Flagged", "Unread" and "Attached" and by doing this, you can quickly access the mails you want among dozens of e-mails.

Group Your Mails Under New Folders



You can create a new folder for the mails in your inbox and categorize your mails under this folder. Thus, you can group your emails in the folders you named.

Open More Than One E-mail Address



You can open up to 20 e-mail addresses with the same GSM number on Mailim.

If You Are A Turkcell, You Can Use Mailim Without Spending Your Internet Package

Turkcell subscribers do not spend their internet packages while using Mailim. Turkcell subscribers can use without spending internet packages over Turkcell LTE/3G without spending their internet packages.

Mailim, our mail! DOWNLOAD NOW FOR FREE!

For more information and assistance, you can visit our website: https://yaanimail.com/

Privacy policy: https://yaanimail.com/policy
descriptionShort: Mailim is a fast and secure e-mail service.
